entity.name: Medic Mobile, Inc
entity.description: Medic designs, delivers, and supports world-class, open-source software for health workers providing care in the worldâ€™s hardest-to-reach communities. We believe providing communities with sophisticated, human-centered technology is an effective tool on the path to achieving a more just world, where universal health coverage is a reality and health is a secured human right.

projects.name: CHT Core
projects.description: The CHT Core Framework makes it faster to build responsive, offline-first digital health apps that equip health workers to provide better care in their communities. It is a central resource of the Community Health Toolkit.
